abortReshardCollection.Message: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore is a managed database where you do not need to run shard management commands. Sharding commands other than shardCollection and enableSharding are not supported. You only need to enable sharding on collections. Shard management activities such as load balancing, failover and other operations are handled by the platform instead.
